sentences.en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
sentences.cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

sentences.en: Children are dying, and I am helpless to do anything.
sentences.cn: 孩子们已奄奄一息，而我却无力做任何事情。

sentences.en: He conjured them with his dying breath to look after his children.
sentences.cn: 他临终时恳求他们照顾他的孩子.

sentences.en: I made my home there, in the hollow of a dying elm.
sentences.cn: 我在一棵快要枯死的榆树的树洞里安了家。

sentences.en: I shall remember that to my dying day.
sentences.cn: 我将在有生之年都记着它。

sentences.en: I will remember it to my dying day .
sentences.cn: 我至死都不会忘记此事。

sentences.en: I'm dying for a breath of fresh air.
sentences.cn: 我非常渴望能呼吸到新鲜空气。

sentences.en: In her dying days the old Queen unbent a little.
sentences.cn: 在临死的那些日子里，年迈的女王态度稍缓和了一些。

sentences.en: It was her dying wish to have a simple burial.
sentences.cn: 她的临终遗愿是办个简朴的葬礼。

sentences.en: It'llstay in my mind till my dying day.
sentences.cn: 它将长存我心，直到生命的终点。

sentences.en: Order me a pot of tea, I'm dying of thirst.
sentences.cn: 给我来一壶茶，我快要渴死了。

sentences.en: Patients were dying because of an acute shortage of nurses.
sentences.cn: 因为护理人员严重不足，患者生命垂危。

sentences.en: She was compelled to fulfil the dying wishes of her mother.
sentences.cn: 她不得不去实现她母亲的临终遗愿。

sentences.en: She was dying to talk to Frank.
The dead and the dying were everywhere.
sentences.cn: 到处都是死尸和奄奄一息的人。

sentences.en: TV pictures showed a dying bird coated with oil.
sentences.cn: 电视画面上出现了一只身上沾满油污、奄奄一息的小鸟。

words.tran_cn: 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的
致命的；非常的；死一般的
死；死一样的状态；无精打采
变得如死一般；失去活力
死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 每天有人在死去；有些地方的人们正逐渐死亡；不断有人死去；有人濒临死亡
